CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT(Product_Family__c) = 'DESKTOP_PRODUCTS' || TEXT(Product_Family__c) = 'DESKTOP_SPLA' || TEXT(Product_Family__c) = 'DESKTOP_ENHANCEMENT' || TEXT(Product_Family__c) = 'CLOUD_PRODUCTS'|| TEXT(Product_Family__c) = 'ANALYTICS CLOUD'|| TEXT(Product_Family__c) = 'INTELLIGENCE' ||TEXT(Product_Family__c) = 'DISTRIBUTION CLOUD' || TEXT(Product_Family__c) = 'DISTRIBUTION_CLOUD', TotalPrice , 0)
CustomField.label: Software Products Excluding Subscription
